dcterms:creator: Y. Li
R. Yu
C. Shahabi
Y. Liu
dcterms:description: METR collects traffic speed by sensors on the highway of Los Angeles County. The dataset utilizes 207 sensors and covers the time period from March 1st to June 30th in 2012, totaling four months of data.
dcterms:title: METR

dcterms:creator: S. Guo
Y. Lin
N. Feng
C. Song
H. Wan
dcterms:description: PEMS datasets are from California Transportation Agenciesâ€™ Performance Measurement System (PeMS). The dataset contains more than 39,000 sensors deployed on highways in major metropolitan areas in California, focusing on average traffic speed collected in real time every 30 seconds and aggregated in 5 minutes. The specific dataset used in this paper includes 6 months of data from January to May in 2017, with 325 sensors selected.
dcterms:title: PEMS
